SEARCH
Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.controller.sidebar

Klasse SidebarController

java.lang.Object
org.com.controller.sidebar.SidebarController
public class SidebarController extends Object
Controller for the application's sidebar navigation. Manages navigation between different views (Dashboard, Movies, Series, Anime, etc.) and controls the display in the main content area.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
umut
Siehe auch:

    • loadLoggerView

      public void loadLoggerView()
      Loads the logger view to display system logs. If loading fails, an appropriate error message is logged.

    • loadDashboardView

      public void loadDashboardView()
      Loads the dashboard view and initializes it with the current dashboard model. If loading fails, an appropriate error message is logged.

    • loadCinematicView

      private void loadCinematicView(String viewPath)
      Helper method for loading movie, series, or anime views. Loads the corresponding view and initializes its controller with media data.
      Parameter:
      viewPath - The path to the FXML file of the view to be loaded

    • updateMainContent

      private void updateMainContent(javafx.scene.Parent content)
      Updates the main content of the application with a new view.
      Parameter:
      content - The new view to be displayed

    • handleLoadError

      private void handleLoadError(String viewName, Exception e)
      Central error handling for view loading failures.
      Parameter:
      viewName - Name of the view that failed to load
      e - The exception that occurred
